desc: This course offers an expansion of ballet vocabulary and technique with an emphasis on movement quality, integrity and efficiency. Outside work includes practicing, reading, writing and concert attendance. . Prerequisite: Dance 121 (at least twice) and/or permission of the instructor. Offered both semesters. 221 can be repeated with instructors permission.
name: Ballet II
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Dance 121 (at least twice) and/or permission of the instructor. Offered both semesters. 221 can be repeated with instructors permission.
